31 class ParticleForceGenerator
32 {
33 public:
34
39 virtual void updateForce(Particle *particle, real duration) = 0;
40 };
41
46 class ParticleGravity : public ParticleForceGenerator
47 {
49 Vector3 gravity;
50
51 public:
52
54 ParticleGravity(const Vector3 &gravity);
55
57 virtual void updateForce(Particle *particle, real duration);
58 };

87 protected:
89 Vector3 *anchor;

93
95 real restLength;
96
97 public:
98 ParticleAnchoredSpring();

102 real springConstant,
103 real restLength);
104
106 const Vector3* getAnchor() const { return anchor; }
107
109 void init(Vector3 *anchor,
110 real springConstant,
111 real restLength);
112
114 virtual void updateForce(Particle *particle, real duration);
115 };

247 class ParticleForceRegistry
248 {
249 protected:
250
255 struct ParticleForceRegistration
256 {
257 Particle *particle;
258 ParticleForceGenerator *fg;
259 };
260
264 typedef std::vector<ParticleForceRegistration> Registry;
265 Registry registrations;
266
267 public:
272 void add(Particle* particle, ParticleForceGenerator *fg);
273
279 void remove(Particle* particle, ParticleForceGenerator *fg);
280
286 void clear();
287
292 void updateForces(real duration);
293 };
294}
